title: Chapter 409
body:
Chapter 409

409 Hit him in the face

In the pit, there was a patch of bright red flowers. These flowers were actually in the shape of a Dragon. It was as if a small dragon was soaring in the sky, and it was extremely lifelike.

...

This was a dragon’s blood flower. It was said that it could only grow when the blood of a true dragon was spilled. It was many times more precious than Dragon saliva grass.

Lu Ming was overjoyed. With these dragon blood flowers, Lu Ming’s true war Dragon technique would probably advance to the next level.

Buzzzzzz!

All of a sudden, an extremely sharp force slashed at Lu Ming.

It was Huang chixuan.

At that moment, his eyes were cold as he slashed his phoenix wings at Lu Ming.

“Nine Dragons trampling the heavens!”

Lu Ming took a step forward without hesitation.

Bang!

Huang chixuan’s body flew out, while Lu Ming hit the wall.

Buzzzzzz! Buzzzzzz!

Lu Ming’s hands moved quickly, plucking more than ten dragon blood flowers and storing them in the Supreme shrine.

Hmph!

Seeing Lu Ming put away the Dragon blood flower, Huang chixuan snorted coldly and turned to leave.

A cold glint flashed in Lu Ming’s eyes and a murderous intent appeared at the corner of his mouth.

Then, he continued to move forward along the cave.

This cave was still very wide, and it was definitely a place where true dragons could enter and exit.

Suddenly, there was a commotion ahead.

“A bone is embedded here!”

“Could this be a Dragon Bone?”

“Haha, it’s mine!”

“You’re looking for death!”

Instantly, a loud boom and battle cries could be heard.

dragon bones? ”

Lu Ming’s heart skipped a beat and he flew rapidly in that direction.

If it really was a Dragon Bone, its value would be terrifying. It was much more valuable than Dragon saliva grass and dragon blood flower.

“Phoenix Lake, Huang chixuan, you’re despicable! Achoo!”

Before Lu Ming arrived, he could already hear angry roars and screams.

Lu Ming turned into a flash of lightning and crossed several miles in an instant.

On the wall in front of him, a bone Xun the size of a water tank was embedded in the stone wall.

The bone armor was crystal clear like jade, full of Holy Qi, and exuded a terrifying essence Qi fluctuation.

Huang chixuan led five or six masters of Phoenix Lake and killed more than a dozen young men from other areas.

“Haha, the Dragon Bone is mine!”

Huang chixuan laughed.

He reached out to grab the Dragon Bone and pulled it out, but the Dragon Bone did not move at all.

“So tight? Again!”

Just as Huang chixuan was about to use all his strength to pull out the Dragon Bone.

BOOM!

Lu Ming arrived and kicked instinctively.

Nine Dragons heaven stomping steps!

“Damn it!”

Huang chixuan was shocked and quickly abandoned the Dragon Bone, using the Phoenix Wing slash.

The other young men from Phoenix Lake also used their unique skills to block Lu Ming’s attack.

BOOM!

Huang chixuan’s body trembled slightly. For the other Masters of Phoenix Lake, his face turned pale and he almost spat out blood.

However, Lu Ming also retreated rapidly.

Other than Huang chixuan, the other six people in Phoenix Lake were all in the eighth grade of martial ancestor realm. Furthermore, they were all battle-hardened.

Together, they were extremely powerful.

“Brat, it’s you again. The Dragon Bone is mine, you want to fight for it? You’re looking for death!”

Huang chixuan roared.

“Yours? This is a Dragon’s Den, when did it become yours?”

Lu Ming sneered.

“Fine, since you’re looking for death, I’ll fulfill your wish. Let’s attack together and kill him.”

Huang chixuan roared.

Then, the Phoenix Wing slash was slashed out.

The other six Phoenix Lake experts also unleashed their ultimate moves and charged toward Lu Ming.

“Heaven’s path palm!”

Lu Ming struck out with his palm. A huge palm print was formed and blasted toward the people of Phoenix Lake.

BOOM!

A huge explosion shook the Dragon Cave and energy spread out.

However, the surroundings of the dragon’s cave were extremely hard. Even with their strength that could destroy a mountain, they could only knock down a few rocks on the cave’s stone walls.

Bang!

The heaven path palm print was pierced through. Huang chixuan and the others ‘bodies only swayed slightly before they continued to attack Lu Ming.

“Brat, you will die today!”

Huang chixuan’s eyes were cold.

“You’re bullying me with numbers, right? Do you think I’m afraid of you guys? dan dan (egg/egg), smash it!”

Lu Ming gently patted the stone egg hanging on his hair.

Dandan. This was the name Lu Ming had randomly given the stone egg.

Immediately, the stone egg trembled slightly, spun, and turned into the size of a human head. With a Swoosh, it rushed toward one of the Masters of Phoenix Lake.

“Break!”

The master of Phoenix Lake struck out with his claw, and the claw radiance was shocking.

However, he was stunned the next moment. He completely ignored the claw radiance and rushed past it. Then, he bounced up and smashed directly at the nose of the Phoenix Lake Master.

Bang!

Kachaa!

This time, it hit him hard, and the sound of bones breaking immediately rang out.

Then, there was a shrill scream.

Lu Ming realized that it was really terrible. The bridge of his nose had completely caved in. His bones were shattered and his flesh was a mess. He could not even recognize his mother.

Buzzzzzz!

Dandan flew back and jumped up and down in front of Lu Ming, as if she was very excited.

Huang chixuan and the others were dumbfounded.

“Damn it, what are you using? How dare you sneak attack me! Despicable!”

Huang chixuan roared.

“Despicable? Huang chixuan, you scumbag, you’re actually talking to me about despicable, you’re not worthy.”

Lu Ming shouted coldly.

“Damn it, kill!”

Huang chixuan roared.

“Dandan, smash!”

Lu Ming said.

Dandan jumped up in excitement, spun around, and flew forward with a Swoosh.

“Block it, smash it!”

Huang chixuan roared and struck out his strongest blow.

The others were the same.

However, it was useless. Dandan completely ignored these attacks and rushed past.

Bang!

Another young man from Phoenix Lake was smashed in the face.

Instantly, the sound of bones breaking and a shrill cry of pain sounded.

This young man had also followed in the footsteps of the person before him.

His nose, nose, and mouth had all caved in. It was unrecognizable. It was a terrible sight.

Although he was not dead, he could not use much of his combat strength.

Hiss hiss hiss

The remaining young men of Phoenix Lake gasped. Looking at the miserable state of the two young men, their teeth were chattering and they felt a chill down their backs.

“Who’s next?”

Lu Ming’s eyes started to look around.

damn it, this stone egg is not afraid of energy attacks. Use weapons!

Huang chixuan roared.

“Oh, really? Then it’s you, Huang chixuan!”

Lu Ming pointed at him.

Buzzzzzz!

Dandan directly flew out.

“Get lost!”

Huang chixuan wore his spirit weapon gloves and his claws grabbed towards dandan.

Just as she was about to catch dandan, she bounced up, changed direction, and smashed towards Huang chixuan.

“Ah!”

Huang chixuan roared and quickly retreated.

She tried her best to protect her face with her hands, but she was still too late.

Bang!

It hit his face accurately.

A blood-curdling scream was accompanied by a furious roar.

Huang chixuan’s claws waved and at the moment when dandan hit him, he also hit dandan.

Bang!

Dandan was sent flying. She changed her direction halfway and flew back to Lu Ming’s side. She bounced here and there, seemingly a little unhappy.

Lu Ming looked at Huang chixuan.

Although Huang chixuan was hit, he was not as miserable as the others, but he did not feel good either.

His nose was completely crooked, and a few of his teeth had fallen out, causing blood to flow out.

He was in such a sorry state.

Huang chixuan roared again and again.

Someone passed by not far away and was dumbfounded.

Huang chixuan and the others were actually beaten up so badly?
